pages.text: Eventually you may realize that you don't have enough room to use your $(aura) near the location where it's being generated. The $(item)Aura Transporter$() can help a botanist move aura to wherever it is needed. This does however come at a cost, transporting aura over large distances will result in a lot of aura being lost.

The $(item)Aura Transporter$() has a limited range but it can also reach $(aura) spots in a radius around it. Two aura transporters can be connected by interacting with one while you're sneaking and then interacting with the other one while you're not sneaking. You can put a transporter into $(thing)sending mode$() by providing it with a redstone signal.
Creating the $(item)Aura Transporter$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$()
